lottery.name: Neo Lottery
lottery.description: Experience fair lottery draws powered by VRF randomness. Buy tickets with GAS, compete for the prize pool, 100% on-chain transparent verification.

coinflip.name: Coin Flip
coinflip.description: Classic 50/50 betting reimagined on blockchain. Flip a coin with cryptographically secure randomness for provably fair results.

dicegame.name: Dice Game
dicegame.description: Roll the dice to test your luck! Choose your winning range, place your bet, and watch VRF-powered dice determine your fate.

scratchcard.name: Scratch Card
scratchcard.description: Digital scratch cards with instant wins. Scratch to reveal your prize, rewards sent instantly to your wallet.

secretpoker.name: Secret Poker
secretpoker.description: Privacy-preserving poker using zero-knowledge proofs. Your hand stays secret while ensuring fair gameplay.

neocrash.name: Neo Crash
neocrash.description: Thrilling multiplier game. Watch the multiplier rise and cash out before it crashes!

redenvelope.name: Red Envelope
redenvelope.description: Send lucky GAS red envelopes to friends. Create envelopes, share links, let friends grab the prizes!

secretvote.name: Secret Vote
secretvote.description: Private on-chain voting using zero-knowledge proofs. Your vote stays secret, results are verifiable.

canvas.name: Collaborative Canvas
canvas.description: On-chain collaborative pixel canvas. Every pixel is an NFT, create art together with users worldwide.

flashloan.name: Flash Loan
flashloan.description: Uncollateralized instant lending. Borrow, use, and repay within a single transaction for arbitrage and liquidations.

neoswap.name: Neo Swap
neoswap.description: Decentralized token exchange. Instantly swap tokens in the NEO ecosystem at the best prices.

explorer.name: Block Explorer
explorer.description: Explore the Neo blockchain. View transactions, blocks, addresses and smart contract details.

candidatevote.name: Candidate Vote
candidatevote.description: Vote for Neo consensus node candidates. Participate in network governance, support nodes you trust.

neoburger.name: NeoBurger
neoburger.description: Neo staking aggregator. Stake NEO to get bNEO, auto-compound to maximize yields.

fogchess.name: Fog Chess
fogchess.description: Strategic chess with fog of war mechanics. Only see pieces within your vision range.

fogpuzzle.name: Fog Puzzle
fogpuzzle.description: Solve puzzles shrouded in mystery. Reveal tiles strategically and race against time.

cryptoriddle.name: Crypto Riddle
cryptoriddle.description: Crack cryptographic riddles and brain teasers to unlock GAS rewards.

millionpiecemap.name: Million Piece Map
millionpiecemap.description: Own and customize pixels on a massive collaborative canvas.

puzzlemining.name: Puzzle Mining
puzzlemining.description: Mine GAS by solving increasingly difficult puzzles.

gascircle.name: Gas Circle
gascircle.description: Join community savings circles where members pool GAS and take turns.

compoundcapsule.name: Compound Capsule
compoundcapsule.description: Maximize yields with automatic compounding of your earnings.

selfloan.name: Self Loan
selfloan.description: Borrow against your own collateral with zero liquidation risk.

grantshare.name: GrantShare
grantshare.description: Create and fund community grants with transparent on-chain tracking.

devtipping.name: Dev Tipping
devtipping.description: Support open-source developers directly with tips for their contributions.

breakupcontract.name: Breakup Contract
breakupcontract.description: Create immutable relationship agreements on-chain with smart contract enforcement.

exfiles.name: Ex Files
exfiles.description: A secure vault for shared memories with mutual consent controls.

onchaintarot.name: On-Chain Tarot
onchaintarot.description: Receive mystical tarot readings powered by VRF randomness.

timecapsule.name: Time Capsule
timecapsule.description: Lock messages or assets that unlock at a future date.

heritagetrust.name: Heritage Trust
heritagetrust.description: Create smart inheritance plans for automatic asset transfer.

gardenofneo.name: Garden of Neo
gardenofneo.description: Cultivate virtual gardens where plants grow based on blockchain activity.

graveyard.name: Graveyard
graveyard.description: Create permanent digital memorials as tombstone NFTs.

govbooster.name: Gov Booster
govbooster.description: Amplify your governance power through staking and delegation.

burnleague.name: Burn League
burnleague.description: Compete in token burning competitions to reduce supply.

masqueradedao.name: Masquerade DAO
masqueradedao.description: Participate in governance wearing a digital mask anonymously.

govmerc.name: Gov Merc
govmerc.description: Hire governance mercenaries or sell your voting power.

neons.name: Neo Name Service
neons.description: Register human-readable .neo domain names for your wallet.

guardianpolicy.name: Guardian Policy
guardianpolicy.description: Define and enforce smart contract policies for your wallet.

unbreakablevault.name: Unbreakable Vault
unbreakablevault.description: Store valuable assets in a time-locked vault with multiple security layers.
